General.Name: Companhia de Fiação e Tecidos Cedro e Cachoeira S.A
General.Description: Companhia de Fiação e Tecidos Cedro e Cachoeira S.A. operates as a textile company in Brazil. It primarily offers denims, twills, and screens. The company was founded in 1872 and is headquartered in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua ParaIba, 330, 8o e 9o andares, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil, 30130-917
